pullRequest.title: SONARJAVA-3633 FP in S4032 when there are several source directories

commit.message: SONARJAVA-3633 FP in S4032 when there are several source directories
Add coverage for default package and multiple files from same package

nodes.bodyText: The behavior of scanFile seems to be that it adds a package to one or the other but not both. Is the explicit removal of valid packages from the the set of unneeded packages necessary?
To avoid  the silent corruption of one of the test files,  we should probably repeat the test with a call to singular onFile.
